attributes.action: exempt Tony Jackson from Road Tax and give him a free pint in every pub he visits
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Tony Jackson is a deserving individual who is against the "pay as you go" road tax. His support for this campaign should be rewarded with a free pint or two. Please note; he's a better driver after a pint or two.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
